author: covener
msg: "LDAPReferrals off" does not disable LDAPReferrals feature. Default OpenLDAP value for LDAP_OPT_REFERRALS is ON and the current code does not set it to OFF even when there is "LDAPReferrals off" directive in the config file.
- "on" - default. Calls apr_ldap_set_option to set referrals on.
- "off" - Calls apr_ldap_set_option to turn referrals off.
- "default" - Does not call apr_ldap_set_option at all.
The default remains ON.  If "default" and SDK defaults to ON, no rebind callback
Submitted By: Jan Kaluza <kaluze AT redhat.com>

author: jailletc36
msg: Use %S instead of %C which already in use
